data.message: what is up with the ton of scammers on facebook lately?? I get a constant barrage like I had never before!! email me at scams. im an army corp and I need money scams. I love you marry me and send me money scams. why has facebook all of a sudden been barraged with this ridiculousness?

replies.message: Hi Maribeth. You can change your filter preferences right from your inbox. Keep in mind, messages that are filtered out of your inbox will appear in your Other folder. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1rMBSBM  -Ryan

your awesome ryan will try it. thank you! god bless you had one other question. I had a situation with a person who I got to know for 5 months he came out about a few days ago and said he was a scammer and was sorry I had never given him money nor personal info but I guess getting to know me made him feel guilty. I didn't know if I should report it as he never asked me for money or asked me for personal things only that he said he was. let me know what you think is best. god bless you ty again ryan
